pages.text: $(tool)Auto-Smelt$() automatically smelts blocks as you mine them, giving you the smelted result instead of the raw material!$(br2)$(important)Saves time$() and inventory space by skipping the furnace entirely.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(6)Blaze Powder$() grants $(tool)Auto-Smelt +1$()$(br2)Harness the power of the Nether!

pages.title: What It Smelts
pages.text: Automatically smelts:$(li)Iron Ore → Iron Ingot$(li)Gold Ore → Gold Ingot$(li)Copper Ore → Copper Ingot$(li)Sand → Glass$(li)Cobblestone → Stone$(li)Raw food → Cooked food$(li)Clay → Terracotta$(li)And more!

pages.title: Pro Tips
pages.text: $(li)Combine with $(tool)Fortune$() for more smelted ores!$(li)Works with $(tool)Vein Miner$() to smelt entire ore veins$(li)Great for branch mining$(li)Stack levels for... well, it doesn't do much, but it's still cool!$(br2)$(o)Mining has never been hotter!$()
